storageJobDescription: Retroactively apply your replication configuration to replicate objects uploaded before the replication rules were created. This action triggers a job that runs in the background, tasked with synchronising your buckets. To learn more about asynchronous replication, refer to the documentation
storageJobToastSuccessMessage: The synchronisation rule has been created successfully.
storageJobToastErrorMessage: An error occurred while creating the synchronisation rule: {{message}}.
